title: INC-2049: Database connection pool exhaustion causing cascading API failures
description: At 2026-02-08T03:17Z, monitoring detected elevated 5xx error rates on the payments API. Investigation revealed that a connection pool leak in the order-processing service exhausted all available PostgreSQL connections within 40 minutes, causing cascading failures across payments, inventory, and user-facing checkout. Incident lasted 2h14m. Full service restored at 05:31Z by restarting affected pods and deploying a connection pool fix.

inputParams.customerImpact: ~12,000 failed checkout attempts during incident window
